name: Lucidity (itch) (Evin)
description:
Lucidity is a 2D RPG-style escape room!
Can you escape the facility...?

Lucidity was created for a university project and is the second game completely developed and created by me, it is still a work in progress and will be worked on in the future! Any reviews would be greatly appreciated, thank you for all your support.

Features:
  • Code-based puzzles
  • Unique puzzle solving mechanic
  • Interesting visuals
  • Factual information

The story should be added properly in the next update!
